comment.body:
What are your thoughts on this being a PsyOp because not enough people in Africa and India are taking the vaccine?
"Oh if they are losing money then i need to get the vaxx!" that kinda stupidity, do you reckon that is the medias target audience with this story?
Everyday I see people walking alone with a mask on, even better are the ones in their cars alone and still wearing the mask. Madness my friend.

I was reading about the Chinese looking into a digital currency with a time limit, making it impossible to pass on wealth or even save up for something. Turning your money into what is basically a food and clothing voucher that has to be spent before it expires.
The President can't even follow his own train of thought never mind regulations that he gets handed to impose.
